1071090.name: Clean VR
1071090.description:
About

Clean VR is a small scale relaxed VR experience for HTC Vive. Your mission should you choose to accept it is to organize the house before the time runs out!
Or you could just let yourself loose and smash the piano with random objects.

Clean VR was created as a five week long school project by the game industry students of Ahlman Institute.

Features

Free mode:
  • Play the piano
  • Try to get your toy plane to fly
  • Throw objects around

Timed mode:
  • Clean the room

Tools used

Programmers:
  • C#
  • Visual Studio
  • Unity
  • Google
Visual Artists:
  • Blender
  • Gimp
  • Unity

General:
  • Audacity
  • Steam VRTK

Requirements

  • HTC Vive
  • VR Capable PC
